name: Malevolence - The INFINITE RPG!
blurb: Malevolence: the Sword of Ahkranox is an infinite RPG that is first person and 3D, but grid-based and turn-based!

rewards.reward: A motivation pledge! You will receive our thanks and a Malevolence sticker.
Pledging $20 to the project will pre-order you a digital copy of the game when it comes out!
$30 will reserve you a pre-ordered digital copy of the game when it is released, as well as a Malevolence poster!
Bonus pre-order pack! Now that we're hitting our stretch goals, this pledge level will pre-order you a digital copy of both the game AND the first expansion pack when it is released!
Want the soundtrack but don't want all the other stuff? For $40 you'll get a digital copy of the game when it's released, as well as a digital copy of the soundtrack by Nicolas Lee!
ALL DIGITAL - For backers that only want digital goodies, you can also pick up this pledge. You'll receive a digital copy of the game, a digital art book and two Malevolence desktop wallpaper sets!
$50 will reserve you a pre-ordered digital copy of the game when it is released, as well as an autographed Malevolence poster and digital art book!

SPECIAL ALL DIGITAL - For backers that only want digital goodies, you can also pick up this pledge. You'll receive a digital copy of the game, a digital art book, two Malevolence desktop wallpaper sets and a digital soundtrack by Nicolas Lee!

ALL DIGITAL - For backers that only want digital goodies, you can also pick up this pledge. You'll receive two digital copies of the game, a digital art book, a pair of Malevolence wallpapers, a digital soundtrack for the game by Nicolas Lee and your name in the credits as a special contributor!
For $100 you will be sent out a physical copy of the game when it is released, as well as a digital copy for a friend, and will also get two signed posters and a digital art book!

EXTRA SPECIAL ALL DIGITAL - ONLY 20 AVAILABLE!!! For backers that only want digital goodies, you can also pick up this pledge. You'll receive two digital copies of the game, a digital art book, a pair of Malevolence wallpapers, a digital soundtrack for the game by Nicolas Lee, your name in the credits as a special contributor AND on top of that, you will get your picture put into the game, re-drawn as a fantasy character by one of our artists as a portrait that players will find in the game!

For $200 you will get a physical copy of the game when released, two digital copies to give to your friends, a full set of six posters, a digital art book, a physical soundtrack CD and your name listed in the credits!

SUPER EXTRA SPECIAL ALL DIGITAL - ONLY 5 AVAILABLE!!! For backers that only want digital goodies, you can also pick up this pledge. You'll receive two digital copies of the game, a digital art book, a pair of Malevolence wallpapers, a digital soundtrack for the game by Nicolas Lee, your name in the credits as a special contributor AND on top of that, you will get your picture put into the game, but instead of as a painting like the $150 tier, you will become one of the proprietors in the game! Maybe a tavern owner, maybe a temple matron... But it will be very regularly seen by everyone who plays the game!

UBER SPECIAL ALL DIGITAL - ONLY FOUR AVAILABLE!!! For backers that only want digital goodies, you can also pick up this pledge. You'll receive two digital copies of the game, a digital art book, a pair of Malevolence wallpapers, a digital soundtrack for the game by Nicolas Lee, your name in the credits as a special contributor AND on top of that, you will get your picture put into the game, re-drawn as one of the new PLAYER CHARACTERS in the upcoming expansion released next year! But only four of these are available, so get it while it's hot!

For $500 you will get a physical copy of the game when released, three digital copies to give to your friends, a full set of six signed posters, a physical art book, a Malevolence t-shirt, a physical soundtrack CD and your name listed in the credits!

There are only 5 of these available!\r\nIf you pledge $1000 you will get a physical copy of the game when released, five digital copies to give to your friends, a full set of six signed posters, a physical art book signed by one of the art leads, a physical soundtrack CD, your name listed in the credits, a Malevolence logo t-shirt, a Malevolence special art t-shirt and a specially made prototype set of the accompanying card game that isn't released publicly until the end of next year!
